spatial_accuracy.notes: Severe failure in layout fidelity. The 2D plan depicts a residential upper floor with three bedrooms and an activity area, but the 3D render hallucinations a ground-floor kitchen/living area with a garage and car. Room adjacencies and wall alignments are completely incorrect.

structural_fidelity.notes: While the model appears as a floating cutaway on a dark background, it fails to include the actual rooms from the plan (Bed 2, 3, 4, Bath) and instead hallucinates a garage/driveway structure.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture does not correspond to the floor plan. The plan shows beds and a balcony set; the render shows a dining table, kitchen island, and living sofas in incorrect clusters.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High adherence to stylistic constraints: low-poly, flat shading, isometric orthographic camera, and clean lighting parameters are well executed.

detected_errors.description: Missing all three bedrooms (Bed 2, 3, 4) and the specific bathroom layout seen in the plan.
Hallucinated a garage with a vehicle and a full kitchen/dining setup not present in the reference layout.
Layout distortion: The central staircase/activity area logic is completely ignored in favor of a generic open-plan living room.
Missing the balcony and balustrade structure entirely.
